review_content:
Look: foggy pale yellow with a moderate white airy head of low retention.
Aroma and taste: grapefruit, malt, lemon zest. Some sugar. Light to medium sweet, light sour.
Mouth feel: light to medium body, average to lively carbonation.
Summary: ok radler.
Can. Golden, slightly hazy. Aroma: grapefruit and black currant, orange and lemonade. Taste: lemonade with beer, orange, lemon, a little grapefruit, for summer.
500 ml can. Poured clear orange pale color. Light grapefruit, tangerine and zest aroma. Taste orange peel, grape and sweet orange candy.

Turbid yellow, no foam.
Nose. A lot of grapefruit is not enough malt.
Taste. carbonation hard taste sweet and sour more lemon. The aftertaste is sweet and notes of malt . I would like a little more malt.
Can. Grapefruit and light malty arom and taste, medium sweet. Light to medium body, grapefruit bitter sweet finish. Ok.

Canned 0,50L. Clear orange pale color, limpid and poor bubbly aspect with light and escaping head. Light grapefruit, tangerine, soda and zest aroma. Watery and bit metallic palate, light crisp mouth with notes of soda, orange peel, grape and sweet orange candy.

Enjoyed: Poured from a can into glass; tried both from shaker and flute glass.
Appearance: Hazy yellow colour, with small head. 
Aroma: Grapefruit, malt.
Palate: Light body, moderate carbonation.
Taste: Malt, grapefruit, citrus, sour/sweet.
Overall impression: Tasty and drinkable, refreshing. One of better Fritz Egger drinks.

Pours with bleach white head and has a foggy yellow body kind of like a witbier. Very strong acidic grapefruit on the nose, wet, with hints of grain barely traceable. Flavour is much like soda pop, sweet, slight dry hints to remind you that there should be some beer in there. So we assume.

Can, 0.5l. Cloudy yellow/orange pour, no head. Soda nose as expected, however much better compared to their lemon radler. Lemon, lime and grapefruit. Again, no beer to be found but that's also as expected. 

Thin body, medium carbonation. Texture and mouthfeel quite ok, moderately thick, not as watery as the lemon variant. Yep, this one is a better product. Sugary sweet taste with slight fruity sourness. Juicy, but artificial. Sticky. Somewhat dry.

Overall, ok thirst quencher. Not bad for what it is, decent cheap supermarket radler.
Can. Hazy yellow with a small white head. Grapefruit, malt, slight toastiness, some sugar. It's actually quite good for a radler.

330ml Dose. Hellgelb und trüb. Weisser Schaum. Es riecht deutlich nach Grapefruit und Citrus. Sehr viel Schale. Der Geschmack ist frusch. Nicht zu limonadig. Das Bier ist noch deutlich erkennbar. Ich finde dieses Radler ist unterbewertet. Manche vergessen einfach was ein Radler ist...
Lata. Yellow, fizzy. Grapefruit soda fruity aroma, note of malt. Sweet dry grape fruit soda flavour, bit grain, bitter like finish (grape fruit).
Can. A hazy yellow beer with a thin white head. The aroma has notes of grapefruit and malt. The flavor is sweet with notes of grapefruits and straw, leading to a bitter grapefruit finish.
0.5 l can. Hazy golden, thin white head. Sour citrus, lemon and grapefruit in aroma and taste with short finish, just as it should be. Not bad.
How : can Appearance : unclear straw with a quickly dissapering white head. Aroma : candy and grapefruit juice. Palate : thin body, high carbonation. Sticky sweet aftertaste.
Look: foggy pale yellow with a moderate white airy head of low retention. Aroma and taste: grapefruit, malt, lemon zest. Some sugar. Light to medium sweet, light sour.…
Can. Golden, slightly hazy. Aroma: grapefruit and black currant, orange and lemonade. Taste: lemonade with beer, orange, lemon, a little grapefruit, for summer.
500 ml can. Poured clear orange pale color. Light grapefruit, tangerine and zest aroma. Taste orange peel, grape and sweet orange candy.
Turbid yellow, no foam. Nose. A lot of grapefruit is not enough malt. Taste. carbonation hard taste sweet and sour more lemon. The aftertaste is sweet and…
Can. Grapefruit and light malty arom and taste, medium sweet. Light to medium body, grapefruit bitter sweet finish. Ok.

Canned 0,50L. Clear orange pale color, limpid and poor bubbly aspect with light and escaping head. Light grapefruit, tangerine, soda and zest aroma. Watery and bit metallic palate, light crisp mouth with notes of soda, orange peel, grape and sweet orange…
Enjoyed: Poured from a can into glass; tried both from shaker and flute glass. Appearance: Hazy yellow colour, with small head.…

Pours with bleach white head and has a foggy yellow body kind of like a witbier. Very strong acidic grapefruit on the nose, wet, with hints of grain barely traceable. Flavour is much like soda pop, sweet, slight dry hints to remind you that there should be some…

Can, 0.5l. Cloudy yellow/orange pour, no head. Soda nose as expected, however much better compared to their lemon radler. Lemon, lime and grapefruit. Again, no beer to be found but that's also as expected.…
Can. Hazy yellow with a small white head. Grapefruit, malt, slight toastiness, some sugar. It's actually quite good for a radler.

330ml Dose. Hellgelb und trüb. Weisser Schaum. Es riecht deutlich nach Grapefruit und Citrus. Sehr viel Schale. Der Geschmack ist frusch. Nicht zu limonadig. Das Bier ist noch deutlich erkennbar. Ich finde dieses Radler ist unterbewertet. Manche vergessen…
Lata. Yellow, fizzy. Grapefruit soda fruity aroma, note of malt. Sweet dry grape fruit soda flavour, bit grain, bitter like finish (grape fruit).
Can. A hazy yellow beer with a thin white head. The aroma has notes of grapefruit and malt. The flavor is sweet with notes of grapefruits and straw, leading to a bitter grapefruit finish.
0.5 l can. Hazy golden, thin white head. Sour citrus, lemon and grapefruit in aroma and taste with short finish, just as it should be. Not bad.
How : can Appearance : unclear straw with a quickly dissapering white head. Aroma : candy and grapefruit juice. Palate : thin body, high carbonation. Sticky sweet aftertaste.
Hazy yellow color, medium sized snow white head. Aroma and taste of fresh lime, lots of citrus. Lively carbonation. Not complete water. Quite good radler.
Fonefan 110415. Yellow colour with a white head. Aroma is grapefruit, sugar, lemon. Flavour is sweet, grapefruit, sugar, lemon. Boring beer.
33 cl. dåse. 2,5 %. Østrisk radler, en blanding mellem øl og limonade. Dejlig frisk og læskende på en varm sommerdag

can from føtex, vesterbrogade. lemon soda and malts in the aroma, Also more orange fruity like note, which could be grapefruit. dry. Flavor is citrus and grapefruit with a little malts thrown in. Quite quenching and tasty, and it is citrussy and dry enough not to be cloying.

fra dåse
duft citrus appelsin vand
smag citrus appelsin måske mere en sodavand ind øl men den smager da ikke dårligt

0,5l can. In the beginning quite refreshing, but it gets more sweetish and sticky every mouthful.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Dåse. Har fundet ud af at radlers er lige mig i sommervarmen. Lys uklar med et lille skumhoved. Duften er grapefrugt og sukker. Smagen er meget sød og frisk med en smule syntetisk citrus. Funker fint.

33 cl can@home in tulip glass@approx 7 degrees C. Pours a cloudy dark yello with medium white head which quickly disappears. Aroma of grapefruit and lemon with hints of malt. Taste is sweet and fizzy. Lemon or grapefruit juice with a barely discernable maltiness and citrus bitterness at finish. Light body, high carbonation and light texture. Refreshing and not as bad as other Radlers I have had. Poured a little Tuborg Classic into the last bit and that improved the taste...more in the direction of beer and away from the sugarpop sweetness. But that is cheating :-)

Pours a hazy pale yellow color, topped with a white foamy head that quickly disappears. Sweet grapefruit aroma is actually pretty nice. Taste is mild, sweet with some soury fruity feel to it. Not a bad one at all, as radlers are concerned.
Reddish pinky colour, Aroma of grapefruits, similar flavours, taste is sweet, with notes of syrup, grapefruits and sugar. Medium carbonation.

Can 330ml.

 [ As Egger Grapefruit Radler ].
Clear matt light to medium yellow color with a average, frothy, good lacing, mostly lasting, white head. Aroma is moderate grapefruit, zest, soda syrup - limonade, sugary. Flavor is moderate sweet with a average duration, grapefruit, zest, tart fruity. Refreshing. Body is medium, texture is watery, carbonation is soft. [20150411]
Bottle @ fonefan tasting. Hazy very pale yellow with a white head. Aroma is sweet, light malty, sugary and lemon. Flavor is quite sweet. Sweet finish. watery. 110415
Can.Clear colour with no head,lively and sweet dry with aroma of greapfruits and acid,sweet with taste of sugar and soda.mild and refreshing finish.
Can. Straight from the can. Not too sweet, with plain citrus zest, grapefruit juicy sweetness, and a quick clean finish. Chuggable.
33 cl. can. Hazy yellow colour with a small white head. Aroma and flavour of grapefruit and lemon.

Can at home. High fluffy white lasting head. Hazy milky light yellow body. Dustu powerful grapefruit aroma. Mild and very sweet lemon rather than grapefruit flavor with little bitterness, low carbonation and a short finish.
light fresh grapefruit aroma,pale, hazy, white foam, lightly sour, light body, oily feel, fizzy, light fresh fruit finish.
Light yellow and hazy. Has a white head. Sweet fruity aroma. Flavor starts sweet, no acid. Syrupy texture.
